params._required: the number of minimum members to approve an transaction, it has to be bigger than 1

params.transactionId: The transaction hashed from getTransactionId function

getTransactionId(address,address,address.details: It encodes and applies keccak256 to the parameters received in the same order

params.amount: Could be the amount or the tokenId
params.blockHash: The block hash in which the transaction with the cross event occurred
params.destinationChainId: Is chainId of the destination chain
params.logIndex: Index of the event in the logs
params.originChainId: Is chainId of the original chain
params.originalTokenAddress: The address of the token in the origin (main) chain
params.receiver: Who is going to receive the token in the opposite chain
params.sender: The address who solicited the cross token
params.transactionHash: The transaction in which the cross event occurred

returns._0: The hash generated by the parameters.

initialize(address).details: Initializes the contract setting the deployer as the initial owner.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._oldMember: address of the member to be removed from federation

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. > Note: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._bridge: the new bridge contract address that should implement the IBridge interface

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.blockHash: The block hash in which the transaction with the cross event occurred
params.destinationChainId: Is chainId of the destination chain
params.logIndex: Index of the event in the logs
params.originChainId: Is chainId of the original chain
params.originalTokenAddress: The address of the token in the origin (main) chain
params.receiver: Who is going to receive the token in the opposite chain
params.sender: The address who solicited the cross token
params.transactionHash: The transaction in which the cross event occurred

isMember.details: The address should be a member to vote in transactions

required.details: It should have at least the required amount of members

votes.details: the members should approve the transaction by 50% + 1

addMember(address).notice: Add a new member to the federation

changeRequirement(uint256).notice: Changes the number of required members to vote and approve an transaction

emitHeartbeat(string,uint256[],uint256[].notice: It emits an HeartBeat like an health check

getMembers().notice: Return all the current members of the federation

getTransactionCount(bytes32).notice: Get the amount of approved votes for that transactionId

getTransactionId(address,address,address.notice: Gets the hash of transaction from the following parameters encoded and keccaked

isMember(address).notice: All the addresses that are members of the federation

processed(bytes32).notice: (bytes32) transactionId => (bool) votedCheck if that transaction was already processed

removeMember(address).notice: Remove a member of the federation

required().notice: The minimum amount of votes to approve a transaction

voteTransaction(address,address,address,.notice: Vote in a transaction, if it has enough votes it accepts the transfer

votes(bytes32,address).notice: (bytes32) transactionId = keccak256( abi.encodePacked( originalTokenAddress, sender, receiver, amount, blockHash, transactionHash, logIndex ) ) => ( (address) members => (bool) voted )Votes by members by the transaction ID
